attributes.action: Hold MP David Wright to Account
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Ensure MP David Wright delivers the report of the Telford Housing Summit

In October 2006, residents met with MP David Wright. During this meeting he promised to deliver a Housing Summit.

After great pressure from residents and two years later, MP David Wright finally arranged a Telford Housing Summit.

MP David wright promised to deliver a report from the Telford Housing Summit held on 27/11/08 by February 2009.

MP david Wright has now failed in his promise sending an email dated 30/06/09 stating he is to busy to keep his promise.

This housing Summit was held to address the housing and social needs of Telford and I now petition the PM to ensure MP David Wright keeps the promise he made to the residents of telford and agencies who attended the Housing Summit and releases the report concerning the telford Housing Summit.

MP David Wright has now released a newsletter saying the report is available. This is untrue.

We now ask that MP David Wright releases the report, maintains his promise to residents and comes clean with the truth.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
